title: Ticket #4212: MacOSX Schedd errors when using MAX_FILE_DESCRIPTORS
description:
A clean install of HTCondor on MacOSX7 shows the following error in the SchedLog when trying to set MAX_FILE_DESCRIPTORS. 

02/13/14 14:01:28 (pid:43949) Initializing Directory: curr_dir = /etc/condor/config.d
02/13/14 14:01:28 (pid:43949) Setting maximum file descriptors to 102400.
02/13/14 14:01:28 (pid:43949) ERROR "Failed to set required limits for MAX_FILE_DESCRIPTORS. setrlimit(8, new = [rlim_cur = 102400, rlim_max = 9223372036854775807]) : old = [rlim_cur = 256, rlim_max = 9223372036854775807], errno: 22(Invalid argument).
" at line 170 in file /Volumes/MacintoshHD2/condor/slot1/dir_56609/userdir/src/condor_utils/limit.unix.cpp
creator: bgietzel
